select easset.product_code productCode, eo.product_name productName, nvl(sum(easset.invest_amount), 0) totalInvestAmount, nvl(sum(easset.total_value), 0) totalAsset, nvl(sum(easset.total_income), 0) totalIncome,
nvl(sum(case when to_char(easset.last_income_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') then easset.last_income else 0 end), 0) recentIncome, easset.product_type productType from ebiz_order eo left join ebiz_asset easset on eo.order_no = easset.order_no where eo.order_status in ('04', '05') and eo.customer_id = #customerId#
group by easset.product_code, easset.product_type, eo.product_name order by easset.product_code desc

select ea.product_code productCode, ea.order_no orderNo, eo.order_status orderStatus, eo.product_name productName, eoa.bank_name bankName, eoa.bank_code bankCode, substr(eoa.card_book_code,-4) cardBookCode, ea.invest_amount totalInvestAmount, nvl(ea.total_income,0) totalIncome, nvl(ea.last_income,0) recentIncome, nvl(ea.total_value,0) totalAsset, ea.value_date valueDate, ea.expiry_date expiryDate, eo.success_date successDate, ea.product_type productType, eo.end_close_date endCloseDate from ebiz_order eo, ebiz_order_account eoa, ebiz_asset ea where eo.order_no = ea.order_no and eoa.order_no = eo.order_no and eo.order_status in ('04', '05') and ea.customer_id = #customerId# and ea.product_code = #productCode# order by eo.success_date desc

select eo.order_no orderNo, ead.income_date incomeDate, nvl(ead.income,0) income, eo.product_code productCode, eo.product_name productName from ebiz_asset_detail ead, ebiz_order eo where eo.customer_id = #customerId# and eo.order_status in ('04', '05') and ead.order_no = eo.order_no order by ead.income_date desc

select eo.product_code as productCode, eo.product_name as productName, eo.order_no as businessNo, eo.order_amount as amount, case when eo.order_status = '02' then '0' when eo.order_status = '03' then '2' when eo.order_status = '04' then '1' when eo.order_status = '05' then '1' when eo.order_status = '06' then '1' when eo.order_status = '09' then '0' end as status, case when eo.order_status = '02' then eo.commit_date when eo.order_status = '03' then eo.commit_date when eo.order_status = '04' then eo.success_date when eo.order_status = '05' then eo.success_date when eo.order_status = '06' then eo.success_date when eo.order_status = '09' then eo.commit_date end as tradeDate, '1' as tradeType from ebiz_order eo where eo.customer_id = #customerId# and eo.order_status in ('02', '03', '04', '05', '06')
and eo.order_no = #orderNo#
and eo.success_date >= #queryBeginDate#
and eo.success_date <= #queryEndDate#
union all
select eo.product_code as productCode, eo.product_name as productName, to_char(es.surrender_id) as businessNo, es.surrender_amount as amount, case when es.status = '0' then '2' when es.status = '4' then '2' when es.status = '1' then '1' when es.status = '3' then '0' when es.status = '2' then '0' end as status, es.surrender_date as tradeDate, '2' as tradeType from ebiz_surrender es, ebiz_order eo where eo.customer_id = #customerId# and es.order_no = eo.order_no
and eo.order_no = #orderNo#
and es.surrender_date >= #queryBeginDate#
and es.surrender_date <= #queryEndDate#
order by tradeDate desc

and eo.order_no = #orderNo#
and eo.success_date >= #queryBeginDate#

union all
select eo.product_code as productCode, eo.product_name as productName, to_char(es.surrender_id) as businessNo, es.surrender_amount as amount, case when es.status = '0' then '2' when es.status = '4' then '2' when es.status = '1' then '1' when es.status = '3' then '0' end as status, es.surrender_date as tradeDate, '2' as tradeType from ebiz_surrender es, ebiz_order eo where eo.customer_id = #customerId# and es.order_no = eo.order_no
